traits.name: Poor Depth Perception
entries: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +9 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6 damage) bludgeoning damage.
